title: Community for Businesses in Latin America and the Caribbean | ConnectAmericas
description: ConnectAmericas, the first social network for businesses in Latin America and the Caribbean dedicated to promoting international trade and investment
text:
ALQUIMISTA
Company description
See translation
Nuestra empresa de dedica a cultivar hierbas medicinales para luego envasarlos, solo trabajamos con hierbas medicinales científicamente comprobadas y que estén en tratados de fitofarmacos, el objetivo es complementar la medicina natural con la medicina alopatica en paraguay se consume la medicina natural en gran cantidad, como por ejemplo para la diabetes, colesterol, para la digestión es por ello que estamos en este negocio.

Badges
[]
These badges certify that certain information declared by a company has been verified, so it can increase the reliability and visibility of its profile.
This company has declared that: - Its general management and/or its budget decisions are in charge of women, or; - At least 51% of the company is owned by 1 or more women
